body_html:
@wm901115nwpu @andrewharp

Faced the same issue. I got around that by setting

useCamera2API = true

instead of

useCamera2API = isHardwareLevelSupported(characteristics, CameraCharacteristics.INFO_SUPPORTED_HARDWARE_LEVEL_FULL);

at

tensorflow/tensorflow/examples/android/src/org/tensorflow/demo/CameraActivity.java

Line 300 in 3686ef0

useCamera2API = isHardwareLevelSupported(characteristics,

body:
@wm901115nwpu @andrewharp 

Faced the same issue. I got around that by setting 

`useCamera2API = true`

instead of 

`useCamera2API = isHardwareLevelSupported(characteristics,
            CameraCharacteristics.INFO_SUPPORTED_HARDWARE_LEVEL_FULL);`

at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/3686ef0d51047d2806df3e2ff6c1aac727456c1d/tensorflow/examples/android/src/org/tensorflow/demo/CameraActivity.java#L300
